FuncDef:
The terminal debugging command enables debugging information display on the command line terminal.
The undo terminal debugging command disables debugging information display on the command line terminal. The terminal debugging command enables debugging information display on the command line terminal. The undo terminal debugging command disables debugging information display on the command line terminal. Debugging information display is disabled on the command line terminal by default.
ExtraInfo: To enable debugging information display on the command line terminal, run the terminal debugging command. Then you can view system debugging information and analyze faults.
